resources.string: Tap your card to open to the safe
Your matriculation card Info will be shown here.

Save and retrieve data, using your cards.
 1. Tap a card to set up a new "card safe"
 2. Give it a name and some data
 (The data is stored in the phone)
 3. Tap the same card to get back the data
 4. Set up multiple card safes using different cards
Currently there are no settings available
Warning:\n Please use this app at your own risks\n The dev is not responsible for any consequences directly or indirectly resulted from using this app
Developed by Zhu Liang for personal uses only
Disclaimer:\nThis app is not affiliated to or in any ways associated with any organizations
Name this Card Safe\neg. A School/B Bank
Info to associate with this card\n eg. Hints for your password/Notes about this card\n (Data is safely stored on the phone)
